interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Dexter: The Complete Series Collection
Review Date: 2015/08/22
Store: Michael C. Hall  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Paramount Home Entertainment, Drama
Product Description: ['Product Description', "Dexter is a crime drama about Dexter Morgan, a man who leads a double life as an incredibly likeable forensics expert for the Miami Police Department and as an emotionless vigilante serial killer. Taught by his foster father to harness his lust for blood and killing, Dexter lives by his own strict moral code - he only kills murderers who can't otherwise be brought to justice. Dexter is a killer who grapples with fitting into society while, at the same time, he struggles with his inability to feel emotion. The irony of Dexter's life is that he works closely as a blood splatter analyst with the very people who hunt his kind - the homicide departments.", 'Amazon.com', 'Own it all: 8 seasons, exclusive art book and a bonus disc of killer special feature in a collectible slide box inspired by the one Dexter himself uses on the show to catalog his kills. Join your favorite serial killer in all 8 chilling seasons of Showtime’s Emmy and Golden Globe winning series. DVD collection includes 33 discs, featuring all 8 seasons’ episodes and the bonus disc.']
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama, Mystery & Thrillers', 'Format': "Multiple Formats, Box set, Collector's Edition, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Special Edition, Widescreen", 'Contributor': 'Dexter, Michael C. Hall', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 4.97 Pounds', 'Item model number': '27810893', 'Media Format': "Multiple Formats, Box set, Collector's Edition, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Special Edition, Widescreen", 'Run time': '84 hours and 51 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 12, 2013', 'Actors': 'Michael C. Hall, Dexter', 'Studio': 'Paramount', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: I love the Dexter series.  The Collector box is a littler overdone.  It is difficult to store.
Review Title: Five Stars
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

The Heat Sandra Bullock (Actor), Melissa McCarthy (Actor), Paul Feig (Director) & 0 more Rated: R Format: DVD Movies & TV, Studio Specials, 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment, All Fox Titles {'Genre': 'Comedy', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Color, Dolby, Dubbed, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Michael Rapaport, Paul Feig, Taran Killam, Michael McDonald, Peter Chernin, Dan Bakkedahl, Brandon Richardson, Marlon Wayans, Sandra Bullock, Melissa McCarthy, Jenno Topping, Spoken Reasons, Katie Dippold, Tom Wilson, Demian Bichir, Jane CurtinMichael Rapaport, Paul Feig, Taran Killam, Michael McDonald, Peter Chernin, Dan Bakkedahl, Brandon Richardson, Marlon Wayans, Sandra Bullock, Melissa McCarthy, Jenno Topping, Spoken Reasons, Katie Dippold, Tom Wilson, Demian Bichir, Jane Curtin See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 57 minutes'} I did not like this movie AT ALL. I attempted to write a review without clicking any stars, but found that was impossible.

There was so much contention and foul language, I never figured out what the story line was. I bought it new right after it came out. A friend watched with me. We both felt the same about the movie, that it was a waste of money. I donated to Goodwill. Maybe they can make some money on it since it won awards. profile:
The user maintains a strong preference for films and series with coherent storytelling, favoring genres that emphasize quality and substance over crude humor or excessive reliance on conflict. Their previous experiences led them to donate unsatisfactory purchases, reinforcing their commitment to only keeping media that aligns with their standards. The user recently expressed appreciation for a gripping crime drama, highlighting their continued interest in thrillers that blend engaging plots with high production values. 

Their consistent feedback on various cinematic experiences indicates a discerning taste, favoring narratives that resonate deeply and provide clarity. This reflects their trend of favoring stories that challenge the norm while exploring complex characters and moral dilemmas. The user highly values personal recommendations and actively shares their opinions to influence future buying decisions. 

With a recent positive interaction related to a critically acclaimed series featuring a well-known actor, the user's profile reinforces their ongoing preference for drama and thrillers that prioritize character development and intricate storytelling, all while reflecting their established disdain for content that relies excessively on humor or conflict. Overall, they seek immersive cinematic experiences that engage the intellect and emotions, ensuring their choices align with their established values in storytelling.
